body:
@kardianos Here is an example of how to call is:

rdtsc.go
```
package main

func cputicks() uint64

func main() {
	println(cputicks())
	println(cputicks())
}
```

rdtsc.s 
```
TEXT Â·cputicks(SB),4,$0-8
	BYTE	$0x0f; BYTE $0xae; BYTE $0xf0 // MFENCE
	RDTSC
	SHLQ	$32, DX
	ADDQ	DX, AX
	MOVQ	AX, ret+0(FP)
	RET
```

put both files into a single package and build.
